title: Respect Autoplay Feature Toggles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an MLB user

If auto-playable content is not available in the hero space, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi json file to populate the hero with auto-playable content

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the global autoplay feature is on
NOTE: Global autoplay feature should be on by default
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AND the user autoplay setting is set to Off
THEN autoplay will not happen on the homepage for auto-playable content in the hero space

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the global autoplay feature is off
NOTE: To turn the global autoplay feature off, proxy true	https://firebaseremoteconfig.googleapis.com:443/v1/projects/518717772311/namespaces/firebase:fetch	and/or https://firebaseremoteconfig.googleapis.com:443/v1/projects/73121217114/namespaces/firebase:fetch
with the attached firebaseconfig.json
To return back to the on state, close the app, stop proxying, force stop the app, then restart the app again.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN autoplay will not happen on the homepage for auto-playable content in the hero space
AND the autoplay option will not be available in settings

title: Initiate Autoplay on Hero Space
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB user is on the homepage
custom_steps:
WHEN the watch live button is highlighted 
AND the featured content is playable
custom_expected: THEN delay 5 seconds before the video autoplays

title: Homepage: Featured Game Autoplay Navigation on Autoplay
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an MLB user is on the homepage
AND auto-playable content is in the featured space (hero)
AND the "Watch Live" button in the hero space is highlighted

NOTE: If auto-playable content is not in the featured space, first look to see if there is a live game on. If there is, you can choose one of the teams involved as your favorite team to move the game to the featured space. If no live games are available, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached json to populate that space with auto-playable content.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN autoplay is playing
AND the user scrolls down after the second carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the video will stop
AND the background will be the featured image

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has navigated down from the carousels
AND they focus back onto the featured space
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN autoplay will start

title: Homepage featured space autoplay not interactive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the homepage
If auto-playable content is not available in the hero space, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi json file to populate the hero with auto-playable content
custom_expected: THEN the user cannot interact with the player until the player goes to fullscreen

title: Featured Autoplay - Fullscreen after 15 seconds
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an MLB user is on the homepage
AND the "Watch Live" button on the hero is highlighted
If auto-playable content is not available in the hero space, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi json file to populate the hero with auto-playable content
custom_steps:
WHEN autoplay is playing
AND the user is idle for 15 seconds
custom_expected: THEN the player will transition to full screen

title: Featured Space Autoplay- Watch Live Seamless transition
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled MLB user is in MLB.TV App
If auto-playable content is not available in the hero space, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi json file to populate the hero with auto-playable content
custom_steps:
WHEN the hero game is autoplaying the live game
AND the user presses watch live
custom_expected: THEN seamlessly transition to the full screen player

title: Featured Space Autoplay- Entitled User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user
AND the "Watch Live" button on the hero space is highlighted
If the required content is not available in the hero space, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi json files to populate

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains a live game
NOTE: proxy with mastapi_live_game_simulated_in_hero.json file attached
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video should autoplay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains an archived game
NOTE: proxy with yesterdaysMastCall.json file attached
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video should NOT autoplay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains an MLB Network show
NOTE: Test on an account with MLBN credentials (Not currently available for international users)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video should autoplay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains SLIVE/FLIVE content
NOTE: No proxy available. Mark this step as blocked if there is no subscriber live content in the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video should autoplay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains SVOD/FVOD content
NOTE: No proxy available. Mark this step as blocked if there is no free live content in the hero.
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video should autoplay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains SVOD/FVOD content
AND they had previously watched content that is present in the hero
NOTE: No proxy available. Mark this step as blocked if there is no free live content in the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the clip should autoplay from the resume point

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains AppleTV content
NOTE: No proxy available. Mark this step as blocked if there is no subscriber live content in the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video should NOT autoplay

title: Featured Space Autoplay- Un-entitled User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user that does not have streaming entitlements (logged out/ free/ or audio user)
If the required content is not available in the hero space, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi json files to populate

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains a live game
NOTE: proxy with mastapi_live_game_simulated_in_hero.json file attached
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video should NOT autoplay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains an archived game
NOTE: proxy with yesterdaysMastCall.json file attached
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video should NOT autoplay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains an SLIVE/SVOD clip
NOTE: No proxy available. Mark this step as blocked if there is no subscriber live content in the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video should NOT autoplay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains an FLIVE/FVOD clip
NOTE: No proxy available. Mark this step as blocked if there is no free live content in the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video should autoplay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains FVOD content
AND they had previously watched content that is present in the hero
NOTE: No proxy available. Mark this step as blocked if there is no free live content in the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the clip should autoplay from the resume point

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the featured space contains AppleTV content
NOTE: No proxy available. Mark this step as blocked if there is no subscriber live content in the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the video should NOT autoplay

title: Backgrounding Autoplayed Content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an MLB user is on the homepage
AND the "Watch Live" button on the hero is highlighted

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the video is autoplaying
AND a video is playing fullscreen from autoplay 
AND the user backgrounds
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN migrate to the player when returning. (For testing, just make sure that playback resumes properly)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN video is autoplaying 
AND the user backgrounds the app 
AND the player is NOT fullscreen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN disable autoplay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user resumes the app after backgrounding 
AND the player was NOT fullscreen when they backgrounded
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN enable autoplay

title: Homepage Featured Space Autoplay when Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the home page
AND there is non-archive content in the hero space
AND the "Watch Live" button in the hero space is highlighted

If auto-playable content is not available in the hero space, proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the attached mastapi json file to populate the hero with auto-playable game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN hide spoilers is ON
AND the featured content is a game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN autoplay from the start of the broadcast

title: Autoplay next VOD/SVOD in carousel
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the homepage

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I am entitled
AND I select VOD or SVOD videos
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the media will play

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a VOD/SVOD video ends
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the next video from the playlist will play

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN there is an error during video playback
(This can be simulated by blocking https://mlb-cuts-diamond.mlb.com:443/*?* (for vod clips) and https://svod-fst.mlb.com:443/*?* (for svod clips) during playback.)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an error message will display

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN there is an error retrieving the initially selected video
(This can be simulated by blocking https://mlb-cuts-diamond.mlb.com:443/*?* (for vod clips) and https://svod-fst.mlb.com:443/*?* (for svod clips) after the carousels have loaded but before attempting playback.)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display an error modal

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the last video in the carousel has completed playing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app exits back to the homescreen

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN multiple types of video are available in the carousel
(This can be simulated in the most popular carousel by proxying https://dapi.cms.mlbinfra.com/v2/content/en-us/sel-mlb-video-list with the attached json file. The second clip (Stack'd: Jazz Chisholm) will be entitled content that will be skipped by free users)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN only media clips to which I am entitled are autoplayed

title: Autoplay next SVOD & VOD click on thumbnails

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is an entitled MLB user in MLB.TV App
AND selecting SVOD videos to view
AND the video is 10 seconds to the end
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I see an up next tile that we automatically play when the time expires

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is a free user in MLB.TV App
AND selecting VOD videos to watch
AND the video is 10 seconds to the end
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I see an up next tile that we automatically play when the time expires

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN selecting  VOD or SVOD videos to view
AND the up next tile appears
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I can select it to jump straight to that video

title: SVOD Resume point maintained when clip started via autoplay
custom_steps:
WHEN an SVOD clip is started via autoplay (continued play after previous clip ends)
AND the user leaves the video before it is complete by pressing the back button and returning to the homescreen
AND the user selects the same SVOD video again
custom_expected: THEN the SVOD video should resume from the same time the video had reached prior to exiting the video
